thread.title: Toshiba president, senior execs quit over $1.2 bn scandal
thread.title_full: Toshiba president, senior execs quit over $1.2 bn scandal

title: Toshiba president, senior execs quit over $1.2 bn scandal
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Jul 21, 2015, 08:45 BST - UK Markets close in 7 hrs 45 mins Toshiba president, senior execs quit over $1.2 bn scandal AFP – 46 minutes ago View Photo 

Toshiba president Hisao Tanaka and his predecessor Norio Sasaki quit the company on Tuesday as one of Japan's best-known firms was hammered by a $1.2 billion accounting scandal blamed on management's overzealous pursuit of profit. 
The two men were among eight high-level executives at the sprawling conglomerate to take the fall, resigning after an independent report found senior management complicit in a years-long scheme to pad profits.
